mapper.select: select a.*, b.cate1Name from `km_cs_qna` as a join `km_cs_cate1` as b on a.qnaCate1 = b.cate1 JOIN `km_cs_cate2` AS c ON a.qnaCate2 = c.cate2 and b.cate1 = c.cate1 where a.uid = #{uid} order by `qnaNo` desc limit #{start}, 10;
select count(`qnaNo`) from `km_cs_qna` as a join `km_cs_cate1` as b on a.qnaCate1 = b.cate1
SELECT a.* FROM `km_product` as a join `km_product_review` as b on a.prodNo = b.prodNo WHERE a.prodCate1=a.prodCate1 and a.prodCate2=a.prodCate2 and a.prodNo = b.prodNo LIMIT #{start}, 5;

SELECT a.ordDate, c.company, c.prodName, b.`count`, a.ordNo, b.total, a.ordComplete, c.prodCate1, c.prodCate2, c.thumb1, c.uid, c.prodNo FROM km_product_order AS a JOIN km_product_order_item AS b ON a.ordNo =b.ordNo JOIN km_product AS c ON c.prodNo = b.prodNo WHERE a.ordUid = #{uid} ORDER BY a.ordDate DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT a.*, b.cate1Name, c.cate2Name FROM km_cs_qna AS a JOIN km_cs_cate1 AS b ON a.qnaCate1 = b.cate1 JOIN km_cs_cate2 AS c ON a.qnaCate2 = c.cate2 AND a.qnaCate1 = c.cate1 WHERE a.uid = #{uid} ORDER BY a.qnaRdate DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM km_member AS a WHERE a.uid = #{uid};

SELECT a.ordDate, a.ordNo, c.prodCate1, c.prodCate2, c.thumb1, c.prodName, b.`count`, c.price, FLOOR(b.`count` * b.price) AS countPrice, FLOOR((b.`count` * b.price) * (b.discount / 100)) AS disPrice, b.total, a.ordComplete, a.recipName, a.recipHp, a.recipZip, a.recipAddr1, a.recipAddr2 FROM km_product_order AS a JOIN km_product_order_item AS b ON a.ordNo = b.ordNo JOIN km_product AS c ON b.prodNo = c.prodNo WHERE a.ordNo = #{ordNo};
mapper.update: UPDATE km_product_order AS a, km_member AS b SET a.ordComplete = 5, b.`point` = b.`point` + a.`savePoint` WHERE a.ordNo = #{ordNo} AND a.ordUid = #{ordUid} AND b.uid = a.ordUid;
